parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.01

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Assigns the character to a specific cargo / passenger index of the given vehicle.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> character '''assignAsCargoIndex''' [vehicle, index]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> character: [[Object]] - character to assign
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle to assign to
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - cargo / passenger index

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[assignAsCargoIndex]] [myHelicopter, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsGunner]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[getCargoIndex]], [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[unassignVehicle]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
